title: 106_hr3046
content: The Act may be cited as the "Banking and Housing Agency Accountability Preservation Act" and it includes the preservation of certain reporting requirements. The "Banking and Housing Agency Accountability Preservation Act" exempts specific reports from the Federal Reports Elimination and Sunset Act of 1995, including those required by various provisions of laws such as the Employment Act of 1946, Defense Production Act of 1950, and others. The curr_chunk lists various sections of different housing acts, including the United States Housing Act of 1937, National Housing Act, Housing Act of 1954, Department of Housing and Urban Development Act, National Flood Insurance Act, Housing and Community Development Act, and National Manufactured Housing Construction and Safety Standards Act. The curr_chunk lists specific sections of various housing acts, including the Construction and Safety Standards Act of 1974, Department of Housing and Urban Development Act, National Housing Act, Comprehensive Thrift and Bank Fraud Prosecution and Taxpayer Recovery Act of 1990, International Financial Institutions Act, title 31 of the United States Code, Federal Trade Commission Act, Revised Statutes of the United States, and Home Owners' Loan Act. The curr_chunk lists specific sections of various acts related to housing, including the Home Owners' Loan Act, Foreign Operations Appropriations Act, Appalachian Regional Development Act, Export-Import Bank Act, Federal Deposit Insurance Act, Federal Financing Bank Act, National Housing Act, and Federal Home Loan Bank Act. The curr_chunk provides a list of specific sections from various acts related to financial regulations, including the Truth in Lending Act, Equal Credit Opportunity Act, Fair Credit and Charge Card Disclosure Act, and Federal Reserve Act. The curr_chunk lists specific sections from various financial regulations acts, including the Federal Reserve Act, Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, Federal Credit Union Act, Federal Home Loan Bank Act, and Housing and Community Development Amendments of 1978. Elimination of certain reporting requirements in financial regulations acts, including amendments to the Export-Import Bank Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act. The Export-Import Bank Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act were amended to eliminate certain reporting requirements in financial regulations. The bill passed the House of Representatives on October 19, 1999.
